title: OMG My Kids Said WHAT?
description: This is a collection of kid quotes compiled over the last 5 years. They're alternately funny, heartwarming, and OMG LOL. Guaranteed to make you smile!"'OMG My Kids Said What?' Is a great collection of quotes, stories and annecdotes that really show the frankness of children. An enjoyable, honest read that left me smiling." - Dust Jacket Wasteland Reviews"Funny, honest, and all too familiar... from having children and from once having been a child." - Dennis Sharpe, Author of "Destroyer of Worlds"
author: G.R.D. Wheeler
